name: Down Dash
description:
It's non-stop, addictive, one-touch gaming at it's purest!

***Game Features***

- Simple one touch move left control
- Avoid the spikes move the sides
- Free exclusive characters for ios!
- Reach the super-hard endless rage mode
- Share a screenshot of your score with friends and show off your Down Dash majesty!

***Think you got what it takes***
Survive as long as you can! Avoid the spikes and don't die! It seems simple enough, but this little bit will quickly find things getting tricky!

***Super Addictive***
If you thought Color Switch was addictive then you'll love DOWN DASH! Don't believe me? Try it!! Once you pick it up you'll have a hard time putting it down.

***Be the Best***
Post your scores to Game Center to show off your survival skills. Let everyone know that you cannot be stopped!

***Universal Gameplay and Retina Graphics***
Enjoy playing on your iPod, iPhone and iPad with this fun and addictive game! Clean, minimal graphics across all platforms!
